title: Controls for continuous grain dryer
summary: Controls to continuously monitor and analyse the grain dryers, controlled remotely using a mobile phone or tablet

eligible.eligibleBullet01: be controls for a continuous grain dryer
eligible.eligibleBullet02: continuously monitor and analyse the grain dryer
eligible.eligibleBullet03: send the information to a mobile phone or tablet
eligible.eligibleBullet04: be accessed and controlled remotely using a mobile phone or tablet
